resources.string: Please first allow permissions by toggling them in the settings, and then click the button below to start the SIAS evaluation. Once taken, the score will be displayed and then saved to your device. Once you have taken the test, please start the data collection using the second button. If you retake the test, the new score will not be saved. Please, do not clear any application space for the duration of the study.
I get nervous if I have to speak with someone in authority (teacher, boss, etc.).
I have difficulty making eye contact with others.
I become tense if I have to talk about myself or my feelings.
I find it difficult to mix comfortably with the people I work with.
I find it easy to make friends my own age.
I tense up if I meet an acquaintance in the street.
When mixing socially, I am uncomfortable.
I feel tense if I am alone with just one other person.
I am at ease meeting people at parties, etc.
I have difficulty talking with other people.
I find it easy to think of things to talk about.
I worry about expressing myself in case I appear awkward.
I find it difficult to disagree with another’s point of view.
I have difficulty talking to attractive persons of the opposite sex.
I find myself worrying that I won’t know what to say in social situations.
I am nervous mixing with people I don’t know well.
I feel I’ll say something embarrassing when talking.
When mixing in a group, I find myself worrying I will be ignored.
I am tense mixing in a group.
I am unsure whether to greet someone I know only slightly.
Data is being collected in the background.
This is due to data collection being disabled in the app. Please click here to go to enable it.
A system error occurred and the test score could not be saved. Please try again by clicking the button, or if the error persists, quit and immediately email me at 2255541h@student.gla.ac.uk.
If you would like to know more about this test, you can find more information in the application settings.
Thank you for taking the test. Your SIAS score is
Please make sure to enable the Usage Statistics permisssion and then disable battery optimisations. You can find this in the settings.
Shows a notification if data is being collected or not
Shows a notification whenever the phone restarts notifying the user if the data collection has resumed or not
Shows a notification whenever data is collected in a user session
You have not yet taken the test.
Your personal identifier was copied to the clipboard.
The app has not yet generated a key for you.
Click here to enable the usage stats permission
Click here to disable battery optimization
Click here to toggle the successful data collection notification. It serves no functional purpose however you may like the success indicator.
Shows if the service is running
Shows a notification if the machine is learning.
Data failed to delete. Please manually clear the cache and data from the system settings.
Data may not have been fully exported due to a system error.

Use this option to delete the application data from your phone. If it succeeds, the application should stop and close right away. In case it fails, you will need to manually go into the system settings and clear the data from there. This will not clear any data that you may have exported from within the Settings.
